## Input parameters

```{r}
# Comment ----------------------------------------------------------------------
# THE FILE NAME TO READ IN AND THE FILE NAME OF THE STANDARDIZED DATA TO SAVE
country <- "Iceland"  # choices "Ghana", "Liberia", "Sierra Leone", "Iceland"

# Here you need to specifiy location and file name of your standardized data:
file.name <- "data-tidy/VMS_standardized.csv"

# Name of file containing rasterized effort (now only number of pings)
raster.name <- "data-products/Effort_raster.asc"

# Resolution for the effort grid
grid.resolution <- 0.05
# Decimal degree units

# Range of speeds considered as fishing
speed.min <- 2
speed.max <- 4.5

# Range of the maps (in decimal degrees)
if (country == "Ghana"){
lon.min <- -4
lon.max <- 2

lat.min <- 3.0
lat.max <- 7
}

if (country == "Sierra Leone") {
lon.min <- -15
lon.max <- -12

lat.min <- 6
lat.max <- 10
}

if (country == "Liberia") {
lon.min <- -12
lon.max <- -10

lat.min <- 5.5
lat.max <- 7
}

if (country == "Iceland") {
lon.min <- -26
lon.max <- -14

lat.min <- 63
lat.max <- 65
}
```

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```

```{r}
# Needed libaries
library(sp)
library(raster)
library(rgdal)

library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(rio)

library(viridis)
library(mapdata)
library(ghsllr)
```


```{r}
vms <- readr::read_csv(file.name)
eff <- vms_compute_effort(vms, grid.resolution,
                          lon.min = lon.min, lon.max = lon.max,
                          lat.min = lat.min, lat.max = lat.max)
vms_plot_effort(eff)

writeRaster(eff, file = raster.name, format = "ascii", overwrite = TRUE)

```
